title: Foster care in the U.S. - number of children waiting for adoption 2007 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of children, containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of children has decreased over the Year.
Number of children is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of children, of value 133682.0 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Number of children about 101945.0 was reached at Year 2012
